name: Cat Box Cleaner
description:
Become a CatBox Cleaner!

How to play:

- Click/Drag to clean litter.

- Earn $20 and 10 Waste to win!

- Next catbox becomes available at 90% cleaned.

It's a very limited prototype for the Mundane Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) (https://itch.io/jam/mundane-jam). I was only able to work on it for 2 days (~12.75h total), but I'm happy with how it feels so far. I have plans for an upgrade system, new catboxes, and more soon! To be continued...
